Outdoors enthusiast and educator Dirk Hilyard has a passion for natural environments and works to incorporate sustainability into his educational programming whenever appropriate. Mr. Hilyard has extensive experience in Event Planning, Lesson Planning, Classroom Management, Learning Technology, and Curriculum Development.
